Created attachment 583756
dragstart-bug.html

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:12.0a1) Gecko/20111221 Firefox/12.0a1
Build ID: 20111221031226

Steps to reproduce:

Using an ul with height and overflow scroll to display a list of items with an internal scroll bar, press ctrl+a (or cmd+a on mac) to select all the content on screen, then attempt to use the internal scroll bar on the ul.

I also tried preventing the default on dragstart event to stop this behavior but dragstart is not run when using an internal scroll bar.

See attach html for a demo.

Test in version 6 and nightly 12.0a1 (2011-12-21)



Actual results:

The selected content is dragged and attached to the  mousepointer .


Expected results:

the user should scroll down the list items in the ul.
